summary: Alexis - Standalone Follower (Available in UNP, CBBE, 7Base) (Also Available In Vanilla Outfit form)
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q0kwvw8av/Alexis_UNP1.jpg[/img]

Name: Alexis
Race: Nord
Location: Solitude Blacksmith (inside)
Voice: Female Eager
Marriageable: yes
Height: .92
Weight: 60
Body: UNP, CBBE, 7Base (only download one) (All Body Types Are As They Come Directly From Their Mods - No Changes Have Been Made)
Skin: 2K Leyenda Skin
Armor:  Black Viper (Vanilla Option - Blades Armor w/ No Helmet)
Jewelry: Various KS Jewelry
Weapon: Vanilla Ebony Sword & Ebony Bow/Arrows

ENB:  RealVision
Tested with AFT & EFF

Average Skills.  Level With Player.  Only Spell is Healing.

**Please be gentle, this is my first attempt but I am open to comments/suggestions**

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/aql1opcsn/Alexis_UNP.jpg[/img]

[center][/center][color=#ff0000][size=3]REQUIREMENTS:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPSME Skeleton[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]      
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels[/url] (for Black Viper armor)

For Vanilla Option, you should only need skeleton (if any issues please inform me)

[color=#ff0000][size=3]RECOMMENDED:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]FaceLight[/url] (used in screenshots)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url]

[color=#ff0000][size=3]INSTALLATION:[/size][/color]

Manual or your favorite mod manager

[color=#ff0000][size=3]UNINSTALL:[/size][/color]

Manual removal of all Alexis files/folders or use your favorite mod manager removal process.

[color=#ff0000][size=3]KNOWN ISSUES: [/size][/color]

Some clipping was noticed during the testing of the CBBE version.  All body and armor files are in their natural state and unaltered.  I'm not sure how to fix plus in addition I did not obtain permission to alter the armor.

[color=#ff0000][size=3]MANY THANKS TO:[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76828/?]Make a Follower Kit[/url] (for making this possible)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/31634110/?]MightyNINE[/url]  (for Creation Kit assistance)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url] (for putting up with me, screenshots, & for testing)
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url] (for moral support & advice)

[color=#ff0000][size=3]CREDITS/RESOURCES/PERMISSIONS:

[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74239/?]Black Viper's Will[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67309/?]KS Jewelry[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512/?]Leyenda Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?]Mikan Eyes
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdo's - Renewal[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76089/?]YevMods - Makeup Pack[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20343/?]RANs Eye Reflection Extender[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/?]RANs HeadMess Variants[/url]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73832/?]Kirsten - For original inspiration[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61818/?]Ebony Weapon Replacer[/url] - Used in Screenshots

I tried my best to remember everyone...if I forgot anyone please remind me.  Thank You.

[center][color=#ff0000][size=4][i]PLEASE CHECK OUT MY OTHER FOLLOWERS:
